org.prebake.service
Interface Config

public interface Config

Configuration for the Prebakery service.

The getters below should consistently return the same value.

getWwwPort

int getWwwPort()
The port on which the service listens for HTTP requests for status info. -1 indicates the service should not listen.

java.lang.String getPathSeparator()
The string used to separate paths, e.g. : on *NIX systems or ; on Windows.

getLocalhostTrusted

boolean getLocalhostTrusted()
True iff the localhost should not be required to present credentials before reading information from the source repo from the HTTP service.
